title: Conditionally hide global site header on /admin-panel/* routes

requirements.summary: Update the shared public Layout to not render the global Header on any route that starts with "/admin-panel", while preserving header behavior everywhere else (including "/admin" login).
acceptanceCriteria: When navigating to any /admin-panel/* route (e.g., /admin-panel/dashboard), the global site Header component is not displayed.
When navigating to public routes like /, /about, /programs, etc., the Header remains displayed exactly as before.
When navigating to /admin (admin login), the Header remains displayed exactly as before.
No other admin panel UI elements (AdminLayout mobile header/sidebar) are removed or visually broken by this change.

file_operations.description: Use TanStack Router location state (e.g., via useRouterState/useLocation) to detect the current pathname and conditionally skip rendering the existing SafeHeader wrapper when the path starts with "/admin-panel"; keep footer and the rest of the layout unchanged to avoid breaking AdminLayout UI.
